page.title: 03CITY FACILITIES
page.content: Class 3W interviewed members of the public in Chester during two, forty minute periods. 54% of the people interviewed were involved in a leisure activity in Chester.72% said that Chester has good sport facilities and 54% are members of sport clubs. 95% said that{Chester has excellent} {shopping facilities.}Certain shops were more popular than others.Here is a list in a descending order of popularity; 1.{Tesco 2.{Marks & Spencers 3.{Debenhams/Browns} 4. Boots 5. small fashion shops etc.
